attributes.action: stop people using the tax payer`s money  to pursue a vendetta
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even though I believe that every citizen of this country should get a fair hearing of any perceived injustice, there comes a time when the public purse should be used for and by  those who cannot afford to employ the legal system to achieve their ends and not by those who can afford it.They should contribute. The public purse should not be spent by or on people who ,for whatever reason, feel they have been slighted by that system.

rejection.details: Please be more explicit and give more specific detail.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
